greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = exp(n) * Sum_{k>=0} (k + n)^n * (-n)^k / k!.
link: Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Bell Polynomial
mathematica: Join[{1}, Table[Sum[Binomial[n, k] BellB[k, -n] n^(n - k), {k, 0, n}], {n, 1, 20}]]
results.author: _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Apr 19 2020
